Title: Correction to: Near-Infrared (NIR) Organic Light-Emitting Diodes (OLEDs): Challenges and Opportunities (Advanced Functional Materials, (2019), 29, 21, (1807623), 10.1002/adfm.201807623)

Mater. 2019, 29, 1807623 In the initially published version of this article, in Table the “Osmium complex” class identifier is missing. The correct Table is as follows: (Table presented.) In addition, in section 4.1 the words “phosphorescence” and “phosphorescent” should be replaced by “luminescence” and “luminescent” respectively. Furthermore, in the initially published version of this article, the “ELECTRON-DONORS” and “ELECTRON-ACCEPTORS” labels in Figure 9 are switched. The correct Figure 9 is as follows: The authors apologize for any inconvenience or misunderstanding that these errors may have caused.
